name: assegaiphp/starter
description: AssegaiPHP is a modern, powerful server-side framework for PHP developers. It is heavily inspired by NestJS and Angular and is designed to be a viable alternative to other modern frameworks. With AssegaiPHP, developers can quickly and easily get their projects up and running with a highly testable, scalable, loosely coupled, and easily maintainable application architecture. The starter project repository contains everything you need to get started with AssegaiPHP, including a pre-configured application skeleton and all the necessary dependencies. Simply install it with composer and you're ready to go!
